page.title: 13INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: The library at Woodhouse is open to the public. There are two parts to the library. There is the adult library which has 111,921 books and there is the children's library which has 23,585 books. The library is situated just off the centre of Woodhouse, on Skelton Lane.More often than not people walk to the library to change their books. The building is not just open for loaning books; it is also open for the loan of tapes, for reading newspapers and for the information shop. Woodhouse Library was first opened to the public on 20th of May, l93l and was opened by the Lord Mayor,Alderman Harold Jackson.The cost of building the library was just Â£4,800.
